## hpr0233 :: rox-filer

 Lightweight apps, Deepgeek reviews "rox-filer," a lightweight gui
file manager. 

An excellent jumping off point on the web is this link... 
 https://polishlinux.org/apps/window-managers/rox-filer-a-lightweight-file-manager-that-simply-rocks/ 

The add-on for an integrated trash can can be found here... 
 https://www.skepticats.com/rox/trash.html
